= pymongo =
[[http://api.mongodb.org/python/current/]]

== 安装 ==
`pip install pymongo`

== 运行 ==
`import pymongo`

=== 连接 ===
`client = MongoClient(host, port)`

=== 创建数据库 ===
直接选择数据库即可，如果数据库不存在，会自动创建

=== 选择数据库 ===
`db = client.dbname`

=== 选择集合 ===
`foo = db.foo`

=== 插入 ===
`foo.insert({"key":"value"})`
